title: How to Draw a Cartoon Monkey Face

steps.title: Draw an ellipse and three circles on top of it.
steps.content: Draw an ellipse and three circles on top of it.

steps.title: Draw his eyes and nose.
steps.content: Draw his eyes and nose. Draw his eyes by sketching an upside down number “3” and two little circles within it. Draw another “3” and two little circles again but make it smaller in order to create his nose. Erase also some inside lines on the ellipse to create his face.

steps.title: Draw his mouth and the details of his ears.
steps.content: Draw his mouth and the details of his ears. Draw his mouth by drawing a half-circle and a small circle inside it. For his ears, draw also two almost circles, one on the left side and the other on the right side.

steps.title: Outline your drawing with a black pen or marker.
steps.content: Outline your drawing with a black pen or marker.

steps.title: Feel free to create different expressions of the cartoon monkey like this one were his sticking his tongue out.
steps.content: Feel free to create different expressions of the cartoon monkey like this one were his sticking his tongue out. Add an expression where he's grinning from ear to ear.

steps.title: Color your drawings and you're done.
steps.content: Color your drawings and you're done. Color the monkeys brown or color them with any color you want.

steps.title: Imagine two circles sitting on top of an oval.
steps.content: Imagine two circles sitting on top of an oval. If you cannot imagine this arrangement, lightly sketch these shapes with a pencil and erase them after the next step.

steps.title: Draw a line around the outside of this shape.
steps.content: Draw a line around the outside of this shape. You should have an oval with two lumps on top. Notice that there are three inward points, one at the top, one at the left and one at the right. If you chose to sketch the two circles and oval, erase any unnecessary lines now. Be sure to erase accordingly.

steps.title: Draw
steps.content: Draw a larger circular shape that just fits around your first drawing. This is the monkey's face .

steps.title: Draw two circle shapes, one attached to each side of the face.
steps.content: Draw two circle shapes, one attached to each side of the face. These are the monkey's ears.

steps.title: Draw a small oval type shape in the center of the monkey's face.
steps.content: Draw a small oval type shape in the center of the monkey's face. This is the monkey's nose.

steps.title: Draw two small vertical lines slightly above the nose.
steps.content: Draw two small vertical lines slightly above the nose. Notice that they look like the number "11". These are the monkey's eyes.

steps.title: Draw a mouth in the appropriate space.
steps.content: Draw a mouth in the appropriate space. Experiment with different types of mouths. A short upward curve makes a good smile . Alternatively, try a small circle or broad line with creases on each end. Place the mouth higher or lower for different effects.

steps.title: Finish the monkey by coloring.
steps.content: Finish the monkey by coloring . Add other interesting details to personalize your monkey.
